title: Betty36
author: Betty36

I also share whitepaper and website linkwebsite: https://metakillers.io/whitepaper: https://metakillers.io/whitepaper.pdf

comments.body: There are many prospective games that have been started in the past two years.  I see a growing interest in Metaverse because Blockchain will be used more and more in the gaming industry. comments.author: danherbias07
comments.body: First of all, don't think "get rich quickly" that's so wrong and you might end up rekt because of too many expectations. Second, where are you in their target audience? A gamer? An investor who will maximize the profits in the pool? You said the game and interesting and likewise about their staking options. Would you do both? It looks good but just a warning, there is no 100 percent assurance in this type of NFT game. Lastly, if you are a player they will need a certain amount to enter other features of the game which I think is where the profits will come from. Page 24. Same type as other NFT games, pyramid.If ever it will be a success, ROI as quickly as you can then just enjoy the game. It's not a make me rich game.
